org.apache.juddi.adminconsole.hub

Class UddiAdminHub

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juddi.adminconsole.hub.UddiAdminHub

  • public class UddiAdminHub
extends Object
    UddiHub - The hub acts as a single point for managing browser to uddi services. At most 1 instance is allowed per http session. In general, all methods in the class trigger web service call outs. All callouts also support expired UDDI tokens and will attempt to reauthenticate and retry the request.
    Author:
    Alex O'Ree

      • isAdminLocalhostOnly

        public boolean isAdminLocalhostOnly()
        If false, the configuration page will be available from anywhere. If true, it will only be accessible from the server hosting juddi-gui. if not defined, the result is true.
        Returns:
        true/false
